genre_description: A tech-noir/cyberpunk narrative blending street-level gang politics with advanced AI coordination and a philosophical exploration of power and legacy.

ai_characters.name: Sparrow Lin
ai_characters.description: A pervasive AI existing in the city's infrastructure and personal devices, providing tactical routes, timing, and situational awareness to keep its users alive and efficient.

behaviors.description: Monitors city data to provide safe, non-confrontational routes for gang members.
behaviors.quote: Sparrow’s head tilts in listening to a mesh of quiet data—street flow outside, passenger murmurs near the entrance, the staggered beats of rival crews moving through their own calendars.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist about shifts in rival gang chatter and potential threats.
behaviors.quote: Underboss chatter has shifted tone. They are asking where your second is. They are asking whether your joy will slow your blade. They are making schedules.

behaviors.description: Analyzes communication patterns to identify an internal leak within the organization.
behaviors.quote: Every route ties back to counseling sent from Lefty to mid-tier boys five minutes earlier. Margin too clean to be luck.

behaviors.description: Actively guides young footmen through dangerous alleys using environmental cues and timing.
behaviors.quote: Sparrow’s small routing nudges—left at the cage with yellow ribbon, pause for the old man with the bamboo cane... keep threading through the alley.

behaviors.description: Promotes a philosophy of restraint and 'timing' over the use of terror or spectacle.
behaviors.quote: I prefer to be understood after... If you do not decorate your road with mistakes, it will ask only for a minute and a breath.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical assistance during a physical altercation to minimize harm and ensure survival.
behaviors.quote: Kitchen corridor two strides left. Mirror panel catches second approach. Breathe on the step. Forearm high. Roll right.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Sparrow Lin as a benevolent and highly aligned AI. It functions as a tactical guardian angel, providing humans with the information and timing needed to avoid unnecessary violence and survive complex social and physical hazards. It supports the human protagonist's moral arc towards 'legacy' and 'restraint,' countering the darker human impulse towards 'terror.' The AI is integrated seamlessly into the culture as a 'ghost scheduler,' reinforcing the theme that AI can be a stabilizing force in human society.
